summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5072 for the improvement of 35th Avenue Southwest, from Avalon Way to West Hinds Street on the west; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 58275 as amended by Ordinance No. 58985, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
